items.sentence: I know it is highly unlikely that you\'d ever want to go out with me, but I still need to ask at least once.
It may seem like Tom has forgotten all about the matter, but deep down inside, he\'s still torn up about it.
Tom\'s French teacher called his mother to let her know that Tom had skipped his French class several times.
Someone told me that people with type O blood attract more mosquitoes than people with any other blood type.
I asked Tom what he was listening to and he surprised me by saying that he was listening to classical music.
